summary: Legolas is a character from the *Lord of the Rings* books. He is an elf prince from the Woodland Realm, and the son of King Thranduil. Legolas joins the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Despite elf-dwarf rivalry, he becomes good friends with the dwarf Gimli. Legolas has super-elf skills, like seeing really far and sensing ancient elf memories. He's a key member of the group, using his skills and archery expertise to help on their quest.
title: Legolas
